data:
Quitting Smoking: It May Take Many Tries Quitting Smoking: It May Take Many Tries Learn how it may take a few attempts before you quit smoking for good. Provides encouragement for people who have quit smoking but started again. The user will understand that people often make many attempts before they quit for good.

https://web.microsoftstream.com/video/f6f322cd-c6cb-48e2-a477-3199b56b428e
